title: Don't wait, apply today at Heritage Glen Townhomes
posting_body: Hello,
Thank you for reaching out to Heritage Glen Townhomes and Westminster Park Apartments!
My name is Josh and I would love to help you with the application process to get you moved in.
Listed below are the current prices for both of our properties.
WE ARE STILL FOLLOWING COVID-19 GUIDELINES.
IF YOU ARE DROPPING OFF AN APPLICATION OR INFORMATION FOR YOUR APPLICATION, BE SURE TO HAVE A MASK WITH YOU.
YOU WILL NOT BE ALLOWED TO ENTER WITHOUT ONE.
Westminster Park:
• 1 bedroom, 1 bath apt. home-
• 2 bedroom, 1.5 bath townhome- $1100.00
• 3 bedroom, 1.5 bath townhome- 1295.00
Heritage Glen:
• 1 bedroom, 1 bath townhome-
• 2 bedroom, 1.5 bath townhome- $1150.00
• 3 bedroom, 1.5 bath townhome- $1275.00
• 3 bedroom, 1.5 bath townhome- $1375.00
PLEASE READ CAREFULLY!!!!
PRICES AND AVAILABILTY ARE SUBJECT TO CHANGE!!!
ALL SECURITY DEPOSITS ARE NON-REFUNDABLE ONCE YOU PUT ONE DOWN!!!!
Gas, heat, and water are included.
You will be responsible for your DTE bill!

In order to qualify for any one of our homes, you will need to provide proof that you gross 3 times the amount of monthly rent; have more positive than negative credit; no prior evictions or monies owed to previous landlords; and we will do a criminal background check as well.
We also ask for your most recent paystubs at least 4, a copy of your social security card and ID.
Application fees are $50.00 per adult and we need a separate money order of $50.00 to hold and process the application.
Application fee is NON-REFUNDABLE!
If you have any questions, we are here Mon-Fri from 9-6PM and Sat.
from 9am-4pm.
Due to Covid-19, please use our phone number and email for communication.
